DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Code to reproduce analyses in paper
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: This R script was tested with R version 3.3.3 on 13 December 2017. It loads the two .csv files also archived with this submission and reproduces the analyses in the paper: t-test, bootstrap sampling of the individual measurements to correct for unequal sample sizes, multiple regression, and model selection.
